titles.title: Business Risk Mitigation and Price Stabilization Act of 2011
To provide end user exemptions from certain provisions of the Commodity Exchange Act and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.subcommittee: Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 13 .
